translated: The Chapter on Not Being Complete
“The one who is safe has been proclaimed there,
Shining in the middle of the sky, Ghatasthāna;
Today there is no dwelling on the great earth,

analyzed: disā bhajavho saraṇāt ja naḥ bhayanti
translated: Today we go for refuge from fear.”
The Jātaka of Ghatasthāna, the third.
